item.description: How to make sure that you’re getting the updated file in #PowerQuery, without the browser’s or server’s caching conflict: deuts.org/∞

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JMDTJXD7WAJVYWNM9FS5N4FD
item.description: #BDO now has a new online online banking website, the functionality of which is pretty much like its mobile app –> No Trust Accounts view or transactions (yet?). At least now it seems to accept auto-fill from my favorite password manager.
item.content:encoded: #BDO now has a new online online banking website, the functionality of which is pretty much like its mobile app –> No Trust Accounts view or transactions (yet?). At least now it seems to accept auto-fill from my favorite password manager.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JM1FQ4QZAA1E56EMSEB43KWA
item.description: @reiver @deuts No, I suppose the 5GB are mostly the cached media from my timeline. They actually expire, 7 days I think by default.
item.content:encoded: @reiver @deuts No, I suppose the 5GB are mostly the cached media from my timeline. They actually expire, 7 days I think by default.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JM1FEZPSMH8AT0FVYNYE91BY
item.description:
@notnorm I use #Pushover for notification, and I have this in the URL: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATION_URL: pushover://shoutrrr:apptoken@userkey/?title=Green

I also have SKIP_TITLE set to true: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATION_SKIP_TITLE: true
item.content:encoded:
@notnorm I use #Pushover for notification, and I have this in the URL: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATION_URL: pushover://shoutrrr:apptoken@userkey/?title=Green

I also have SKIP_TITLE set to true: WATCHTOWER_NOTIFICATION_SKIP_TITLE: true

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JM1F3RHDNHSX7FYHS4JWT86K
item.description:
My #GoToSocial instance is now online. Pulled the image 0.18.0-rc2 and now everything seems back to normal:

services:
  gotosocial:
    image: superseriousbusiness/gotosocial:0.18.0-rc2

Here’s the Github issues that explained what happened: github.com/∞

I now got the status back up notification from #UptimeRobot:

Monitor is UP: Deuts One ( deuts.one/∞ ). It was down for 31 hours and 14 minutes.

What did we learn from this experience?

  1. Exclude GoToSocial in #Watchtower automatic updates.
  2. Stick to explicit version number in your compose.yml file.
  3. Time to re-think self-hosting your own Fediverse instance.
item.content:encoded:
My #GoToSocial instance is now online. Pulled the image 0.18.0-rc2 and now everything seems back to normal:

services:
  gotosocial:
    image: superseriousbusiness/gotosocial:0.18.0-rc2

Here’s the Github issues that explained what happened: github.com/∞

I now got the status back up notification from #UptimeRobot:

Monitor is UP: Deuts One ( deuts.one/∞ ). It was down for 31 hours and 14 minutes.

What did we learn from this experience?

  1. Exclude GoToSocial in #Watchtower automatic updates.
  2. Stick to explicit version number in your compose.yml file.
  3. Time to re-think self-hosting your own Fediverse instance.

item.title: Movary
item.description:
Movary

Self hosted web app to track and rate your watched movies
I wish one of these could prove a better alternative to Trakt.
item.content:encoded:
Movary

Self hosted web app to track and rate your watched movies
I wish one of these could prove a better alternative to Trakt.

item.title: MediaTracker
item.description:
MediaTracker

Self hosted media tracker for movies, tv shows, video games, books and audiobooks.
Another Trakt alternative. Why expand to video games, books, and audiobooks, though?
item.content:encoded:
MediaTracker

Self hosted media tracker for movies, tv shows, video games, books and audiobooks.
Another Trakt alternative. Why expand to video games, books, and audiobooks, though?

item.title: Watcharr
item.description:
Watcharr

Open source, self-hostable watched list for all your content (movies, tv series, anime, games) with user authentication, modern and clean UI and a very simple setup.
Now that Trakt.tv started implementing stricter limits to free users, time to look for alternatives.
item.content:encoded:
Watcharr

Open source, self-hostable watched list for all your content (movies, tv series, anime, games) with user authentication, modern and clean UI and a very simple setup.
Now that Trakt.tv started implementing stricter limits to free users, time to look for alternatives.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JKPQ710DF3HEJY7NRSJCHQSW
item.description: Finished set up of dedicated Python container to house my various Python scripts. Now I don’t have to rely to Code Server container being up in order to execute them on schedule.
item.content:encoded: Finished set up of dedicated Python container to house my various Python scripts. Now I don’t have to rely to Code Server container being up in order to execute them on schedule.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JKB7NFRYS1E7AM98S78ME8M4
item.description: #Memos now has Shortcuts where you can have custom filters set up. Close to one of my wishlists for Memos, but I would have preferred a permalink for these shortcuts so I can bookmark them and easily get back to them later: www.usememos.com/∞ #UseMemos
item.content:encoded: #Memos now has Shortcuts where you can have custom filters set up. Close to one of my wishlists for Memos, but I would have preferred a permalink for these shortcuts so I can bookmark them and easily get back to them later: www.usememos.com/∞ #UseMemos
